An elegy on the truly honoured and greatly beloved Sir VVilliam Jones, who deceased May the 2d. 1682.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for Langley Curtis., London : 1682.
Verse: "WHen the great Hales, who was both ..." Within mourning borders. Imperfect: stained, affecting title and imprint. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
